Dialogue 1.simplified: 你从这里往前一直走,就到师大了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你從這裡往前一直走,就到師大了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ cóng zhèlǐ wǎng qián yīzhí zǒu, jiù dào shīdà le.
Dialogue 1.english: If you go straight from here, you will reach NTNU.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从这个路口往右转,你可以到学校宿舍。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從這個路口往右轉,你可以到學校宿舍。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng zhège lùkǒu wǎng yòu zhuǎn, nǐ kěyǐ dào xuéxiào sùshè.
Dialogue 1.english: If you turn right at this intersection, you can reach the school dormitory.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从学校大门往里面走十分钟,可以到语言中心。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從學校大門往裡面走十分鐘,可以到語言中心。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng xuéxiào dàmén wǎng lǐmiàn zǒu shí fēnzhōng, kěyǐ dào yǔyán zhōngxīn.
Dialogue 1.english: If you walk ten minutes from the school gate, you can reach the language center.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不能(从这里)往前走,前面没有路了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不能(從這裡)往前走,前面沒有路了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bùnéng (cóng zhèlǐ) wǎng qián zǒu, qiánmiàn méiyǒu lù le.
Dialogue 1.english: You cannot go forward (from here), there's no road ahead.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不可以从这个路口往左转,只可以往右转。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不可以從這個路口往左轉,只可以往右轉。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù kěyǐ cóng zhège lùkǒu wǎng zuǒ zhuǎn, zhǐ kěyǐ wǎng yòu zhuǎn.
Dialogue 1.english: You cannot turn left at this intersection, you can only turn right.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这公车不是往师大,是往火车站的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這公車不是往師大,是往火車站的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhè gōngchē bù shì wǎng shīdà, shì wǎng huǒchē zhàn de.
Dialogue 1.english: This bus is not going to NTNU, it is going to the train station.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 白小姐笑起来很美。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 白小姐笑起來很美。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: bái xiǎojiě xiào qǐlái hěn měi.
Dialogue 1.english: Miss Bai looks very beautiful when she smiles.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那里卖的小吃看起来很好吃。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那裡賣的小吃看起來很好吃。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nàlǐ mài de xiǎochī kàn qǐlái hěn hǎochī.
Dialogue 1.english: The snacks sold there look very delicious.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这个房子很小,我住起来不习惯。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這個房子很小,我住起來不習慣。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhège fángzi hěn xiǎo, wǒ zhù qǐlái bù xíguàn.
Dialogue 1.english: This house is very small, I am not used to living in it.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 王先生今天的脸色看起来很不好。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 王先生今天的臉色看起來很不好。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wáng xiānshēng jīntiān de liǎnsè kàn qǐlái hěn bù hǎo.
Dialogue 1.english: Mr. Wang looks very unwell today.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 越南菜看起来很辣,吃起来不太辣。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 越南菜看起來很辣,吃起來不太辣。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yuènán cài kàn qǐlái hěn là, chī qǐlái bù tài là.
Dialogue 1.english: Vietnamese food looks very spicy, but it is not very spicy when you eat it.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你说的事听起来不难。不过,做起来有点难。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你說的事聽起來不難。不過,做起來有點難。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shuō de shì tīng qǐlái bù nán. bùguò, zuò qǐlái yǒudiǎn nán.
Dialogue 1.english: What you said doesn't sound difficult. However, it's a bit difficult to do.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他在门口等着你,你快去吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他在門口等著你,你快去吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā zài ménkǒu děng zhe nǐ, nǐ kuài qù ba!
Dialogue 1.english: He is waiting for you at the door, you should go quickly!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 李明华拿着一杯冰咖啡。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 李明華拿著一杯冰咖啡。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá ná zhe yī bēi bīng kāfēi.
Dialogue 1.english: Li Minghua is holding a cup of iced coffee.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他看着我,什么也没说。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他看著我,什麼也沒說。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā kàn zhe wǒ, shénme yě méi shuō.
Dialogue 1.english: He looked at me and said nothing.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不要一直坐着,我们去运动吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不要一直坐著,我們去運動吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù yào yīzhí zuò zhe, wǒmen qù yùndòng ba!
Dialogue 1.english: Don't just sit there, let's go exercise!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你别带着咖啡到图书馆去,里面不能喝东西。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你別帶著咖啡到圖書館去,裡面不能喝東西。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bié dài zhe kāfēi dào túshūguǎn qù, lǐmiàn bùnéng hē dōngxī.
Dialogue 1.english: Don't bring coffee to the library, you can't drink inside.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 夜市附近的小巷子这么多,要是我没带着地图,一定会迷路。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 夜市附近的小巷子這麼多,要是我沒帶著地圖,一定會迷路。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yèshì fùjìn de xiǎo xiàngzi zhème duō, yàoshi wǒ méi dài zhe dìtú, yīdìng huì mílù.
Dialogue 1.english: There are so many alleys near the night market, if I don't bring a map, I will definitely get lost.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我常常一边走路,一边听歌。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我常常一邊走路,一邊聽歌。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ chángcháng yībiān zǒulù, yībiān tīng gē.
Dialogue 1.english: I often walk while listening to music.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那个小姐喜欢一边吃饭,一边看电视。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那個小姐喜歡一邊吃飯,一邊看電視。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nàgè xiǎojiě xǐhuān yībiān chīfàn, yībiān kàn diànshì.
Dialogue 1.english: That lady likes to eat while watching TV.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 田中诚一常常一边逛夜市,一边照相。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 田中誠一常常一邊逛夜市,一邊照相。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī chángcháng yībiān guàng yèshì, yībiān zhàoxiàng.
Dialogue 1.english: Tian Zhongcheng often visits the night market while taking pictures.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不可以一边骑机车,一边打电话。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不可以一邊騎機車,一邊打電話。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù kěyǐ yībiān qí jīchē, yībiān dǎ diànhuà.
Dialogue 1.english: You can't ride a scooter while talking on the phone.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 请你不要一边上课,一边吃早餐。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 請你不要一邊上課,一邊吃早餐。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: qǐng nǐ bù yào yībiān shàngkè, yībiān chī zǎocān.
Dialogue 1.english: Please don't eat breakfast while attending class.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他没一边工作,一边玩手机。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他沒一邊工作,一邊玩手機。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā méi yībiān gōngzuò, yībiān wán shǒujī.
Dialogue 1.english: He didn't work while playing on his phone.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我家离学校很远。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我家離學校很遠。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ jiā lí xuéxiào hěn yuǎn.
Dialogue 1.english: My home is far from the school.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 离火车站很近的地方,有一家(牛肉)面店的牛肉面很好吃。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 離火車站很近的地方,有一家(牛肉)麵店的牛肉麵很好吃。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lí huǒchē zhàn hěn jìn de dìfāng, yǒu yījiā (niúròu) miàndiàn de niúròu miàn hěn hǎochī.
Dialogue 1.english: There is a beef noodle shop near the train station that has very delicious beef noodles.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你从这里往左边走,离学校不远的地方,可以看到海。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你從這裡往左邊走,離學校不遠的地方,可以看到海。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ cóng zhèlǐ wǎng zuǒbiān zǒu, lí xuéxiào bù yuǎn de dìfāng, kěyǐ kàn dào hǎi.
Dialogue 1.english: If you go left from here, you can see the sea near the school.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 银行离学校不远。你走路去应该就可以了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 銀行離學校不遠。你走路去應該就可以了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yínháng lí xuéxiào bù yuǎn. nǐ zǒulù qù yīnggāi jiù kěyǐ le.
Dialogue 1.english: The bank is not far from the school. You should be able to walk there.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 花莲离台北不很远,可是到那里要花不少时间。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 花蓮離台北不很遠,可是到那裡要花不少時間。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: huālián lí táiběi bù hěn yuǎn, kěshì dào nàlǐ yào huā bù shǎo shíjiān.
Dialogue 1.english: Hualien is not very far from Taipei, but it takes a lot of time to get there.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我要找的房子,不能离夜市太近。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我要找的房子,不能離夜市太近。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ yào zhǎo de fángzi, bùnéng lí yèshì tài jìn.
Dialogue 1.english: The house I am looking for cannot be too close to the night market.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 你從這裡往前一直走,就到師大了。

Dialogue 2.traditional: 我要找的房子,不能離夜市太近。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ yào zhǎo de fángzi, bùnéng lí yèshì tài jìn.
Dialogue 2.english: The house I am looking for cannot be too close to the night market.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 一点也不慢,比捷运方便。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 一點也不慢,比捷運方便。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yīdiǎn yě bù màn, bǐ jiéyùn fāngbiàn.
Dialogue 1.english: Not slow at all, more convenient than the MRT.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + adjective

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他一点茶也不喝。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他一點茶也不喝。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā yīdiǎn chá yě bù hē.
Dialogue 1.english: He doesn't drink any tea at all.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + verb

Dialogue 1.simplified: 夜市的东西一点也不贵。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 夜市的東西一點也不貴。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yèshì de dōngxi yīdiǎn yě bù guì.
Dialogue 1.english: The things in the night market are not expensive at all.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + adjective

Dialogue 1.simplified: 已经晚上十二点多了,他们一点也不想睡觉。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 已經晚上十二點多了,他們一點也不想睡覺。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yǐjīng wǎnshàng shí'èr diǎn duō le, tāmen yīdiǎn yě bù xiǎng shuìjiào.
Dialogue 1.english: It's already past midnight, and they don't want to sleep at all.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + verb

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他昨天一点饭也没吃。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他昨天一點飯也沒吃。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā zuótiān yīdiǎn fàn yě méi chī.
Dialogue 1.english: He didn't eat any rice at all yesterday.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + verb

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我一点汤也没喝。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我一點湯也沒喝。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ yīdiǎn tāng yě méi hē.
Dialogue 1.english: I didn't drink any soup at all.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + verb

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这支手机是不是一点也不好用?所以没人买。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這支手機是不是一點也不好用?所以沒人買。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhè zhī shǒujī shì bù shì yīdiǎn yě bù hǎo yòng? suǒyǐ méi rén mǎi.
Dialogue 1.english: Isn't this phone not useful at all? That's why no one buys it.
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + verb

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他生病这几天一点东西都没吃吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他生病這幾天一點東西都沒吃嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā shēngbìng zhè jǐ tiān yīdiǎn dōngxi dōu méi chī ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Has he not eaten anything at all these days when he's sick?
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + verb

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们来这里玩,你怎么一点也不开心?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們來這裡玩,你怎麼一點也不開心?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen lái zhèlǐ wán, nǐ zěnme yīdiǎn yě bù kāixīn?
Dialogue 1.english: We came here to play, why are you not happy at all?
Dialogue 1.structure: 一点也不(yīdiǎn yě bù) + adjective

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我最近很忙,我们还是周末再出去吃饭吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我最近很忙,我們還是週末再出去吃飯吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ zuìjìn hěn máng, wǒmen háishì zhōumò zài chūqù chīfàn ba!
Dialogue 1.english: I've been very busy recently, let's go out for dinner this weekend instead!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 已经晚上十一点了,我还是明天早上再给老师打电话吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 已經晚上十一點了,我還是明天早上再給老師打電話吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yǐjīng wǎnshàng shíyī diǎn le, wǒ háishì míngtiān zǎoshang zài gěi lǎoshī dǎ diànhuà ba!
Dialogue 1.english: It's already 11 PM, I'll call the teacher tomorrow morning instead!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 去学校,可以坐公车,也可以坐捷运,但是坐捷运比较快,我们还是坐捷运去吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 去學校,可以坐公車,也可以坐捷運,但是坐捷運比較快,我們還是坐捷運去吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: qù xuéxiào, kěyǐ zuò gōngchē, yě kěyǐ zuò jiéyùn, dànshì zuò jiéyùn bǐjiào kuài, wǒmen háishì zuò jiéyùn qù ba!
Dialogue 1.english: To go to school, you can take the bus or the MRT, but the MRT is faster. Let's take the MRT instead!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 坐公车很慢,我们还是不要坐公车吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 坐公車很慢,我們還是不要坐公車吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zuò gōngchē hěn màn, wǒmen háishì bùyào zuò gōngchē ba!
Dialogue 1.english: Taking the bus is slow, let's not take the bus!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 雨下得很大,今天你还是别回家吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 雨下得很大,今天你還是別回家吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yǔ xià de hěn dà, jīntiān nǐ háishì bié huí jiā ba!
Dialogue 1.english: It's raining heavily, you better not go home today!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他听了一定不开心,你还是别告诉他吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他聽了一定不開心,你還是別告訴他吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā tīngle yīdìng bù kāixīn, nǐ háishì bié gàosù tā ba!
Dialogue 1.english: He will definitely not be happy when he hears it, better not tell him!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你走慢一点!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你走慢一點!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ zǒu màn yīdiǎn!
Dialogue 1.english: Walk a bit slower!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你们吃快一点!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你們吃快一點!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐmen chī kuài yīdiǎn!
Dialogue 1.english: Eat a bit faster!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你的字要写好看一点!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你的字要寫好看一點!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ de zì yào xiě hǎokàn yīdiǎn!
Dialogue 1.english: Write your characters a bit more nicely!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不写好看一点,老师说要再写一次。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不寫好看一點,老師說要再寫一次。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù xiě hǎokàn yīdiǎn, lǎoshī shuō yào zài xiě yīcì.
Dialogue 1.english: If you don't write more nicely, the teacher said you have to write it again.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 要是你不唱好听一点,就不能去比赛了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 要是你不唱好聽一點,就不能去比賽了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yàoshi nǐ bù chàng hǎotīng yīdiǎn, jiù bùnéng qù bǐsài le.
Dialogue 1.english: If you don't sing a bit better, you won't be able to go to the competition.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不走快一点,就不能跟朋友见面了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不走快一點,就不能跟朋友見面了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù zǒu kuài yīdiǎn, jiù bùnéng gēn péngyǒu jiànmiàn le.
Dialogue 1.english: If you don't walk faster, you won't be able to meet your friends.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 要上课了。你还不走快一点吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 要上課了。你還不走快一點嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yào shàngkè le. nǐ hái bù zǒu kuài yīdiǎn ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Class is about to start. Why aren't you walking faster?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 路上车那么多。你是不是骑慢一点比较好?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 路上車那麼多。你是不是騎慢一點比較好?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lùshàng chē nàme duō. nǐ shì bùshì qí màn yīdiǎn bǐjiào hǎo?
Dialogue 1.english: There are so many cars on the road. Isn't it better to ride a bit slower?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你说得太快了。可以说慢一点吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你說得太快了。可以說慢一點嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shuō de tài kuài le. kěyǐ shuō màn yīdiǎn ma?
Dialogue 1.english: You spoke too fast. Can you speak a bit slower?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他们开开心心地一起吃饭。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他們開開心心地一起吃飯。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tāmen kāikāixīnxīn de yīqǐ chīfàn.
Dialogue 1.english: They happily eat together.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 王老板客客气气地跟人说话。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 王老闆客客氣氣地跟人說話。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wáng lǎobǎn kè kè qì qì de gēn rén shuōhuà.
Dialogue 1.english: Boss Wang speaks to people politely.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 月美每天都穿得漂漂亮亮(的)。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 月美每天都穿得漂漂亮亮(的)。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yuè měi měitiān dōu chuān de piàopiàoliangliang (de).
Dialogue 1.english: Yuemei dresses beautifully every day.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那里的厨房是不是干干净净的?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那裡的廚房是不是乾乾淨淨的?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nàlǐ de chúfáng shì bù shì gāngānjìngjìng de?
Dialogue 1.english: Is the kitchen there clean?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 学生是不是每天都快快乐乐的?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 學生是不是每天都快快樂樂的?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: xuéshēng shì bù shì měitiān dōu kuài kuàilè lè de?
Dialogue 1.english: Are the students happy every day?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 房东对你们一直都客客气气的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 房東對你們一直都客客氣氣的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: fángdōng duì nǐmen yīzhí dōu kè kè qì qì de.
Dialogue 1.english: The landlord has always been polite to you.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我觉得骑车去不太累,很好玩。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我覺得騎車去不太累,很好玩。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ juéde qí chē qù bù tài lèi, hěn hǎo wán.
Dialogue 1.english: I don't think riding a bike there is too tiring, it's fun.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 高铁票不太贵!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 高鐵票不太貴!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: gāotiě piào bù tài guì!
Dialogue 1.english: High-speed rail tickets are not too expensive!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 今天不太冷!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 今天不太冷!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: jīntiān bù tài lěng!
Dialogue 1.english: It's not too cold today!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 放假的时候,高铁票是不是不太好买?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 放假的時候,高鐵票是不是不太好買?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: fàngjià de shíhòu, gāotiě piào shì bù shì bù tài hǎo mǎi?
Dialogue 1.english: Are high-speed rail tickets not easy to buy during holidays?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 去西班牙的飞机是不是不太多?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 去西班牙的飛機是不是不太多?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: qù xībānyá de fēijī shì bù shì bù tài duō?
Dialogue 1.english: Are there not many flights to Spain?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 台湾的秋天和日本的秋天是不是不太一样?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 台灣的秋天和日本的秋天是不是不太一樣?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: táiwān de qiūtiān hé rìběn de qiūtiān shì bù shì bù tài yīyàng?
Dialogue 1.english: Isn't Taiwan's autumn different from Japan's autumn?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 台湾的北部、南部有很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 台灣的北部、南部有很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: táiwān de běibù, nánbù yǒu hěnduō hǎowán de dìfāng.
Dialogue 1.english: There are many fun places in the northern and southern parts of Taiwan.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 台湾东部的风景很美。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 台灣東部的風景很美。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: táiwān dōngbù de fēngjǐng hěn měi.
Dialogue 1.english: The scenery in eastern Taiwan is beautiful.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 台湾东边的大海非常干净。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 台灣東邊的大海非常乾淨。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: táiwān dōngbiān de dàhǎi fēicháng gānjìng.
Dialogue 1.english: The sea on the east side of Taiwan is very clean.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那个地方西边有山,南边有海。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那個地方西邊有山,南邊有海。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nàgè dìfāng xībiān yǒu shān, nánbiān yǒu hǎi.
Dialogue 1.english: That place has mountains to the west and the sea to the south.

Dialogue 2.traditional: 要是你不唱好聽一點,就不能去比賽了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yàoshi nǐ bù chàng hǎotīng yīdiǎn, jiù bùnéng qù bǐsài le.
Dialogue 2.english: If you don't sing a bit better, you won't be able to go to the competition.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你不走快一点,就不能跟朋友见面了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你不走快一點,就不能跟朋友見面了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ bù zǒu kuài yīdiǎn, jiù bùnéng gēn péngyǒu jiànmiàn le.
Dialogue 2.english: If you don't walk faster, you won't be able to meet your friends.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 要上课了。你还不走快一点吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 要上課了。你還不走快一點嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yào shàngkè le. nǐ hái bù zǒu kuài yīdiǎn ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Class is about to start. Why aren't you walking faster?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 路上车那么多。你是不是骑慢一点比较好?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 路上車那麼多。你是不是騎慢一點比較好?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: lùshàng chē nàme duō. nǐ shì bùshì qí màn yīdiǎn bǐjiào hǎo?
Dialogue 2.english: There are so many cars on the road. Isn't it better to ride a bit slower?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你说得太快了。可以说慢一点吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你說得太快了。可以說慢一點嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shuō de tài kuài le. kěyǐ shuō màn yīdiǎn ma?
Dialogue 2.english: You spoke too fast. Can you speak a bit slower?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他们开开心心地一起吃饭。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他們開開心心地一起吃飯。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tāmen kāikāixīnxīn de yīqǐ chīfàn.
Dialogue 2.english: They happily eat together.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 王老板客客气气地跟人说话。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 王老闆客客氣氣地跟人說話。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wáng lǎobǎn kè kè qì qì de gēn rén shuōhuà.
Dialogue 2.english: Boss Wang speaks to people politely.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 月美每天都穿得漂漂亮亮(的)。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 月美每天都穿得漂漂亮亮(的)。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yuè měi měitiān dōu chuān de piàopiàoliangliang (de).
Dialogue 2.english: Yuemei dresses beautifully every day.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 那里的厨房是不是干干净净的?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 那裡的廚房是不是乾乾淨淨的?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nàlǐ de chúfáng shì bù shì gāngānjìngjìng de?
Dialogue 2.english: Is the kitchen there clean?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 学生是不是每天都快快乐乐的?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 學生是不是每天都快快樂樂的?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: xuéshēng shì bù shì měitiān dōu kuài kuàilè lè de?
Dialogue 2.english: Are the students happy every day?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 房东对你们一直都客客气气的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 房東對你們一直都客客氣氣的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: fángdōng duì nǐmen yīzhí dōu kè kè qì qì de.
Dialogue 2.english: The landlord has always been polite to you.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我觉得骑车去不太累,很好玩。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我覺得騎車去不太累,很好玩。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ juéde qí chē qù bù tài lèi, hěn hǎo wán.
Dialogue 2.english: I don't think riding a bike there is too tiring, it's fun.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 高铁票不太贵!
Dialogue 2.traditional: 高鐵票不太貴!
Dialogue 2.pinyin: gāotiě piào bù tài guì!
Dialogue 2.english: High-speed rail tickets are not too expensive!

Dialogue 2.simplified: 今天不太冷!
Dialogue 2.traditional: 今天不太冷!
Dialogue 2.pinyin: jīntiān bù tài lěng!
Dialogue 2.english: It's not too cold today!

Dialogue 2.simplified: 放假的时候,高铁票是不是不太好买?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 放假的時候,高鐵票是不是不太好買?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: fàngjià de shíhòu, gāotiě piào shì bù shì bù tài hǎo mǎi?
Dialogue 2.english: Are high-speed rail tickets not easy to buy during holidays?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 去西班牙的飞机是不是不太多?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 去西班牙的飛機是不是不太多?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: qù xībānyá de fēijī shì bù shì bù tài duō?
Dialogue 2.english: Are there not many flights to Spain?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 台湾的秋天和日本的秋天是不是不太一样?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 台灣的秋天和日本的秋天是不是不太一樣?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: táiwān de qiūtiān hé rìběn de qiūtiān shì bù shì bù tài yīyàng?
Dialogue 2.english: Isn't Taiwan's autumn different from Japan's autumn?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 台湾的北部、南部有很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 台灣的北部、南部有很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: táiwān de běibù, nánbù yǒu hěnduō hǎowán de dìfāng.
Dialogue 2.english: There are many fun places in the northern and southern parts of Taiwan.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 台湾东部的风景很美。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 台灣東部的風景很美。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: táiwān dōngbù de fēngjǐng hěn měi.
Dialogue 2.english: The scenery in eastern Taiwan is beautiful.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 台湾东边的大海非常干净。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 台灣東邊的大海非常乾淨。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: táiwān dōngbiān de dàhǎi fēicháng gānjìng.
Dialogue 2.english: The sea on the east side of Taiwan is very clean.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 那个地方西边有山,南边有海。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 那個地方西邊有山,南邊有海。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nàgè dìfāng xībiān yǒu shān, nánbiān yǒu hǎi.
Dialogue 2.english: That place has mountains to the west and the sea to the south.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们开始学中文的时间差不多。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們開始學中文的時間差不多。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen kāishǐ xué zhōngwén de shíjiān chàbùduō.
Dialogue 1.english: The time we started learning Chinese is about the same.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那几家超市卖的东西都差不多。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那幾家超市賣的東西都差不多。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nà jǐ jiā chāoshì mài de dōngxī dōu chàbùduō.
Dialogue 1.english: The things sold in those supermarkets are about the same.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们国家的夏天和这里差不多。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們國家的夏天和這裡差不多。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen guójiā de xiàtiān hé zhèlǐ chàbùduō.
Dialogue 1.english: The summer in our country is about the same as here.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我的功课写得差不多了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我的功課寫得差不多了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ de gōngkè xiě de chàbùduō le.
Dialogue 1.english: My homework is almost done.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我的旅行计划得差不多了,你看一看吧!
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我的旅行計畫得差不多了,你看一看吧!
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ de lǚxíng jìhuà de chàbùduō le, nǐ kàn yī kàn ba!
Dialogue 1.english: My travel plan is almost done, take a look!

Dialogue 1.simplified: 找工作的事准备得差不多了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 找工作的事準備得差不多了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhǎo gōngzuò de shì zhǔnbèi de chàbùduō le.
Dialogue 1.english: The job search preparation is almost done.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从这里到捷运站,差不多(走)十分钟。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從這裡到捷運站,差不多(走)十分鐘。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng zhèlǐ dào jiéyùn zhàn, chàbùduō (zǒu) shí fēnzhōng.
Dialogue 1.english: It's about a ten-minute walk from here to the MRT station.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 哥哥和弟弟差不多高。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 哥哥和弟弟差不多高。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: gēgē hé dìdì chàbùduō gāo.
Dialogue 1.english: The older brother and younger brother are about the same height.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我差不多学了四个月的中文了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我差不多學了四個月的中文了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ chàbùduō xué le sì gè yuè de zhōngwén le.
Dialogue 1.english: I've been learning Chinese for about four months.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从学校到捷运站差不多得走多久?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從學校到捷運站差不多得走多久?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng xuéxiào dào jiéyùn zhàn chàbùduō děi zǒu duōjiǔ?
Dialogue 1.english: How long does it take to walk from the school to the MRT station?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你的考试准备得差不多了吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你的考試準備得差不多了嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ de kǎoshì zhǔnbèi de chàbùduō le ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Is your exam preparation almost done?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这两个房间的房租是不是差不多?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這兩個房間的房租是不是差不多?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhè liǎng gè fángjiān de fángzū shì bù shì chàbùduō?
Dialogue 1.english: Are the rents for these two rooms about the same?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我在高中学过中文。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我在高中學過中文。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ zài gāozhōng xué guò zhōngwén.
Dialogue 1.english: I studied Chinese in high school.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我去过那个语言中心。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我去過那個語言中心。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ qù guò nàgè yǔyán zhōngxīn.
Dialogue 1.english: I have been to that language center.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我教过他两年西班牙文。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我教過他兩年西班牙文。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ jiào guò tā liǎng nián xībānyá wén.
Dialogue 1.english: I taught him Spanish for two years.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我以前没学过中文。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我以前沒學過中文。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ yǐqián méi xué guò zhōngwén.
Dialogue 1.english: I haven't studied Chinese before.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我没去过法国。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我沒去過法國。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ méi qù guò fǎguó.
Dialogue 1.english: I haven't been to France.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我没买过那家的面包。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我沒買過那家的麵包。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ méi mǎi guò nà jiā de miànbāo.
Dialogue 1.english: I haven't bought bread from that store.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他去过日本没有?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他去過日本沒有?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā qù guò rìběn méiyǒu?
Dialogue 1.english: Has he been to Japan?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 王老师的课,你上过吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 王老師的課,你上過嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wáng lǎoshī de kè, nǐ shàng guò ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Have you taken Professor Wang's class?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是看过那本书?有意思吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你是不是看過那本書?有意思嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì kàn guò nà běn shū? yǒu yìsi ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Have you read that book? Is it interesting?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 法国,我才去过一次。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 法國,我才去過一次。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: fǎguó, wǒ cái qù guò yīcì.
Dialogue 1.english: I've only been to France once.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 一本书才五十块。真便宜。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 一本書才五十塊。真便宜。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yī běn shū cái wǔshí kuài. zhēn piányí.
Dialogue 1.english: A book is only fifty yuan. Really cheap.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他才学了半年中文。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他才學了半年中文。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā cái xué le bàn nián zhōngwén.
Dialogue 1.english: He has only studied Chinese for half a year.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你今天才吃了一个面包吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你今天才吃了一個麵包嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ jīntiān cái chī le yīgè miànbāo ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Have you only eaten one piece of bread today?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他是不是才学了两个星期的中文?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他是不是才學了兩個星期的中文?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā shì bù shì cái xué le liǎng gè xīngqí de zhōngwén?
Dialogue 1.english: Has he only been studying Chinese for two weeks?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 台北捷运,你才坐过一次吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 台北捷運,你才坐過一次嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: táiběi jiéyùn, nǐ cái zuò guò yīcì ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Have you only taken the Taipei MRT once?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他的电话,我想起来了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他的電話,我想起來了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā de diànhuà, wǒ xiǎng qǐlái le.
Dialogue 1.english: I remembered his phone number.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 那位小姐姓张,我想起来了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 那位小姐姓張,我想起來了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nà wèi xiǎojiě xìng zhāng, wǒ xiǎng qǐlái le.
Dialogue 1.english: I remember that lady's surname is Zhang.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 回到学校以后,以前的事我都想起来了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 回到學校以後,以前的事我都想起來了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: huí dào xuéxiào yǐhòu, yǐqián de shì wǒ dōu xiǎng qǐlái le.
Dialogue 1.english: After returning to school, I remembered everything from before.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他姓张,早上见面的时候我怎么没想起来。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他姓張,早上見面的時候我怎麼沒想起來。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā xìng zhāng, zǎoshang jiànmiàn de shíhòu wǒ zěnme méi xiǎng qǐlái.
Dialogue 1.english: His surname is Zhang, how did I not remember that when we met in the morning?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他是谁,我还没想起来。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他是誰,我還沒想起來。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā shì shéi, wǒ hái méi xiǎng qǐlái.
Dialogue 1.english: Who is he, I haven't remembered yet.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 机车在哪里,他一直没想起来。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 機車在哪裡,他一直沒想起來。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: jīchē zài nǎlǐ, tā yīzhí méi xiǎng qǐlái.
Dialogue 1.english: Where is the scooter, he hasn't remembered yet.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们见过面。你想起来了吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們見過面。你想起來了嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen jiànguò miàn. nǐ xiǎng qǐlái le ma?
Dialogue 1.english: We have met before. Do you remember?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他叫什么名字?你是不是想起来了?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他叫什麼名字?你是不是想起來了?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā jiào shénme míngzì? nǐ shì bù shì xiǎng qǐlái le?
Dialogue 1.english: What is his name? Did you remember?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你的东西在哪里,想起来了没有?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你的東西在哪裡,想起來了沒有?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ de dōngxī zài nǎlǐ, xiǎng qǐlái le méiyǒu?
Dialogue 1.english: Where are your things, did you remember?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你现在才来,大家等你很久了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你現在才來,大家等你很久了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ xiànzài cái lái, dàjiā děng nǐ hěn jiǔ le.
Dialogue 1.english: You are just arriving now, everyone has been waiting for you for a long time.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他是昨天才到台北的,所以睡得不好。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他是昨天才到台北的,所以睡得不好。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā shì zuótiān cái dào táiběi de, suǒyǐ shuì de bù hǎo.
Dialogue 1.english: He only arrived in Taipei yesterday, so he didn't sleep well.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我等了十分钟,捷运才来。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我等了十分鐘,捷運才來。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ děng le shí fēnzhōng, jiéyùn cái lái.
Dialogue 1.english: I waited for ten minutes, and then the MRT arrived.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我跟你一起住了十年了,我不是现在才了解你的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我跟你一起住了十年了,我不是現在才了解你的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ gēn nǐ yīqǐ zhù le shí nián le, wǒ bù shì xiànzài cái liǎojiě nǐ de.
Dialogue 1.english: I've been living with you for ten years, I didn't just start understanding you now.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他不是今天才告诉老板他不能来上班的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他不是今天才告訴老闆他不能來上班的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā bù shì jīntiān cái gàosù lǎobǎn tā bùnéng lái shàngbān de.
Dialogue 1.english: He didn't just tell the boss today that he can't come to work.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们不是今天才认识的,是三年前就认识的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們不是今天才認識的,是三年前就認識的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen bù shì jīntiān cái rènshì de, shì sān nián qián jiù rènshì de.
Dialogue 1.english: We didn't just meet today, we met three years ago.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 王先生这个月才来上班的吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 王先生這個月才來上班的嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wáng xiānshēng zhège yuè cái lái shàngbān de ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Did Mr. Wang just start working this month?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是昨天晚上十点才打电话给他的?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你是不是昨天晚上十點才打電話給他的?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì zuótiān wǎnshàng shí diǎn cái dǎ diànhuà gěi tā de?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you just call him at ten o'clock last night?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你什么时候才可以跟我去看电影?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你什麼時候才可以跟我去看電影?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shénme shíhòu cái kěyǐ gēn wǒ qù kàn diànyǐng?
Dialogue 1.english: When will you be able to go to the movies with me?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 今天学的汉字,我还得练习练习。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 今天學的漢字,我還得練習練習。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: jīntiān xué de hànzì, wǒ hái děi liànxí liànxí.
Dialogue 1.english: I still need to practice the Chinese characters we learned today.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你有空的时候,应该去旅行。多认识认识一些台湾朋友。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你有空的時候,應該去旅行。多認識認識一些台灣朋友。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ yǒu kòng de shíhòu, yīnggāi qù lǚxíng. duō rènshì rènshì yīxiē táiwān péngyǒu.
Dialogue 1.english: When you have time, you should travel. Get to know some Taiwanese friends.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我想了解了解你是怎么学中文的,为什么说得这么流利。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我想了解了解你是怎麼學中文的,為什麼說得這麼流利。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng liǎojiě liǎojiě nǐ shì zěnme xué zhōngwén de, wèishéme shuō de zhème liúlì.
Dialogue 1.english: I want to know how you learned Chinese and why you speak so fluently.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 下星期要考试,你怎么不准备准备呢?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 下星期要考試,你怎麼不準備準備呢?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: xià xīngqí yào kǎoshì, nǐ zěnme bù zhǔnbèi zhǔnbèi ne?
Dialogue 1.english: There's a test next week, why aren't you preparing?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你不练习练习写字,听写怎么考得好?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你不練習練習寫字,聽寫怎麼考得好?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bù liànxí liànxí xiězì, tīngxiě zěnme kǎo de hǎo?
Dialogue 1.english: If you don't practice writing, how will you do well in dictation?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们不参观参观,怎么知道这个学校好不好?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們不參觀參觀,怎麼知道這個學校好不好?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen bù cānguān cānguān, zěnme zhīdào zhège xuéxiào hǎo bù hǎo?
Dialogue 1.english: If we don't visit, how will we know if this school is good?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我是妳男朋友,妳是不是应该多关心关心我?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我是妳男朋友,妳是不是應該多關心關心我?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ shì nǎi nán péngyǒu, nǎi shì bù shì yīnggāi duō guānxīn guānxīn wǒ?
Dialogue 1.english: I am your boyfriend, shouldn't you care about me more?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这个周末,你要不要在家休息休息?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這個週末,你要不要在家休息休息?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhège zhōumò, nǐ yào bù yào zài jiā xiūxí xiūxí?
Dialogue 1.english: Do you want to stay at home and rest this weekend?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我有什么机会可以认识认识新朋友?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我有什麼機會可以認識認識新朋友?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ yǒu shé me jīhuì kěyǐ rènshì rènshì xīn péngyǒu?
Dialogue 1.english: What opportunities do I have to meet new friends?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我们开始学中文的时间差不多。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我們開始學中文的時間差不多。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒmen kāishǐ xué zhōngwén de shíjiān chàbùduō.
Dialogue 2.english: The time we started learning Chinese is about the same.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 那几家超市卖的东西都差不多。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 那幾家超市賣的東西都差不多。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nà jǐ jiā chāoshì mài de dōngxī dōu chàbùduō.
Dialogue 2.english: The things sold in those supermarkets are about the same.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我们国家的夏天和这里差不多。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我們國家的夏天和這裡差不多。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒmen guójiā de xiàtiān hé zhèlǐ chàbùduō.
Dialogue 2.english: The summer in our country is about the same as here.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我的功课写得差不多了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我的功課寫得差不多了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ de gōngkè xiě de chàbùduō le.
Dialogue 2.english: My homework is almost done.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我的旅行计划得差不多了,你看一看吧!
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我的旅行計畫得差不多了,你看一看吧!
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ de lǚxíng jìhuà de chàbùduō le, nǐ kàn yī kàn ba!
Dialogue 2.english: My travel plan is almost done, take a look!

Dialogue 2.simplified: 找工作的事准备得差不多了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 找工作的事準備得差不多了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhǎo gōngzuò de shì zhǔnbèi de chàbùduō le.
Dialogue 2.english: The job search preparation is almost done.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 从这里到捷运站,差不多(走)十分钟。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 從這裡到捷運站,差不多(走)十分鐘。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: cóng zhèlǐ dào jiéyùn zhàn, chàbùduō (zǒu) shí fēnzhōng.
Dialogue 2.english: It's about a ten-minute walk from here to the MRT station.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 哥哥和弟弟差不多高。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 哥哥和弟弟差不多高。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: gēgē hé dìdì chàbùduō gāo.
Dialogue 2.english: The older brother and younger brother are about the same height.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我差不多学了四个月的中文了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我差不多學了四個月的中文了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ chàbùduō xué le sì gè yuè de zhōngwén le.
Dialogue 2.english: I've been learning Chinese for about four months.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 从学校到捷运站差不多得走多久?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 從學校到捷運站差不多得走多久?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: cóng xuéxiào dào jiéyùn zhàn chàbùduō děi zǒu duōjiǔ?
Dialogue 2.english: How long does it take to walk from the school to the MRT station?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你的考试准备得差不多了吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你的考試準備得差不多了嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ de kǎoshì zhǔnbèi de chàbùduō le ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Is your exam preparation almost done?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 这两个房间的房租是不是差不多?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 這兩個房間的房租是不是差不多?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhè liǎng gè fángjiān de fángzū shì bù shì chàbùduō?
Dialogue 2.english: Are the rents for these two rooms about the same?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我在高中学过中文。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我在高中學過中文。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ zài gāozhōng xué guò zhōngwén.
Dialogue 2.english: I studied Chinese in high school.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我去过那个语言中心。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我去過那個語言中心。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ qù guò nàgè yǔyán zhōngxīn.
Dialogue 2.english: I have been to that language center.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我教过他两年西班牙文。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我教過他兩年西班牙文。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ jiào guò tā liǎng nián xībānyá wén.
Dialogue 2.english: I taught him Spanish for two years.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我以前没学过中文。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我以前沒學過中文。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ yǐqián méi xué guò zhōngwén.
Dialogue 2.english: I haven't studied Chinese before.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我没去过法国。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我沒去過法國。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ méi qù guò fǎguó.
Dialogue 2.english: I haven't been to France.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我没买过那家的面包。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我沒買過那家的麵包。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ méi mǎi guò nà jiā de miànbāo.
Dialogue 2.english: I haven't bought bread from that store.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他去过日本没有?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他去過日本沒有?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā qù guò rìběn méiyǒu?
Dialogue 2.english: Has he been to Japan?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 王老师的课,你上过吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 王老師的課,你上過嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wáng lǎoshī de kè, nǐ shàng guò ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Have you taken Professor Wang's class?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是看过那本书?有意思吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你是不是看過那本書?有意思嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì kàn guò nà běn shū? yǒu yìsi ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Have you read that book? Is it interesting?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 法国,我才去过一次。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 法國,我才去過一次。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: fǎguó, wǒ cái qù guò yīcì.
Dialogue 2.english: I've only been to France once.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 一本书才五十块。真便宜。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 一本書才五十塊。真便宜。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yī běn shū cái wǔshí kuài. zhēn piányí.
Dialogue 2.english: A book is only fifty yuan. Really cheap.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他才学了半年中文。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他才學了半年中文。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā cái xué le bàn nián zhōngwén.
Dialogue 2.english: He has only studied Chinese for half a year.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你今天才吃了一个面包吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你今天才吃了一個麵包嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ jīntiān cái chī le yīgè miànbāo ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Have you only eaten one piece of bread today?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他是不是才学了两个星期的中文?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他是不是才學了兩個星期的中文?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā shì bù shì cái xué le liǎng gè xīngqí de zhōngwén?
Dialogue 2.english: Has he only been studying Chinese for two weeks?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 台北捷运,你才坐过一次吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 台北捷運,你才坐過一次嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: táiběi jiéyùn, nǐ cái zuò guò yīcì ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Have you only taken the Taipei MRT once?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他的电话,我想起来了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他的電話,我想起來了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā de diànhuà, wǒ xiǎng qǐlái le.
Dialogue 2.english: I remembered his phone number.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 那位小姐姓张,我想起来了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 那位小姐姓張,我想起來了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nà wèi xiǎojiě xìng zhāng, wǒ xiǎng qǐlái le.
Dialogue 2.english: I remember that lady's surname is Zhang.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 回到学校以后,以前的事我都想起来了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 回到學校以後,以前的事我都想起來了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: huí dào xuéxiào yǐhòu, yǐqián de shì wǒ dōu xiǎng qǐlái le.
Dialogue 2.english: After returning to school, I remembered everything from before.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他姓张,早上见面的时候我怎么没想起来。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他姓張,早上見面的時候我怎麼沒想起來。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā xìng zhāng, zǎoshang jiànmiàn de shíhòu wǒ zěnme méi xiǎng qǐlái.
Dialogue 2.english: His surname is Zhang, how did I not remember that when we met in the morning?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他是谁,我还没想起来。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他是誰,我還沒想起來。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā shì shéi, wǒ hái méi xiǎng qǐlái.
Dialogue 2.english: Who is he, I haven't remembered yet.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 机车在哪里,他一直没想起来。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 機車在哪裡,他一直沒想起來。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: jīchē zài nǎlǐ, tā yīzhí méi xiǎng qǐlái.
Dialogue 2.english: Where is the scooter, he hasn't remembered yet.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我们见过面。你想起来了吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我們見過面。你想起來了嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒmen jiànguò miàn. nǐ xiǎng qǐlái le ma?
Dialogue 2.english: We have met before. Do you remember?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他叫什么名字?你是不是想起来了?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他叫什麼名字?你是不是想起來了?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā jiào shénme míngzì? nǐ shì bù shì xiǎng qǐlái le?
Dialogue 2.english: What is his name? Did you remember?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你的东西在哪里,想起来了没有?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你的東西在哪裡,想起來了沒有?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ de dōngxī zài nǎlǐ, xiǎng qǐlái le méiyǒu?
Dialogue 2.english: Where are your things, did you remember?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你现在才来,大家等你很久了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你現在才來,大家等你很久了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ xiànzài cái lái, dàjiā děng nǐ hěn jiǔ le.
Dialogue 2.english: You are just arriving now, everyone has been waiting for you for a long time.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他是昨天才到台北的,所以睡得不好。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他是昨天才到台北的,所以睡得不好。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā shì zuótiān cái dào táiběi de, suǒyǐ shuì de bù hǎo.
Dialogue 2.english: He only arrived in Taipei yesterday, so he didn't sleep well.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我等了十分钟,捷运才来。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我等了十分鐘,捷運才來。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ děng le shí fēnzhōng, jiéyùn cái lái.
Dialogue 2.english: I waited for ten minutes, and then the MRT arrived.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我跟你一起住了十年了,我不是现在才了解你的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我跟你一起住了十年了,我不是現在才了解你的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ gēn nǐ yīqǐ zhù le shí nián le, wǒ bù shì xiànzài cái liǎojiě nǐ de.
Dialogue 2.english: I've been living with you for ten years, I didn't just start understanding you now.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他不是今天才告诉老板他不能来上班的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他不是今天才告訴老闆他不能來上班的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā bù shì jīntiān cái gàosù lǎobǎn tā bùnéng lái shàngbān de.
Dialogue 2.english: He didn't just tell the boss today that he can't come to work.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我们不是今天才认识的,是三年前就认识的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我們不是今天才認識的,是三年前就認識的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒmen bù shì jīntiān cái rènshì de, shì sān nián qián jiù rènshì de.
Dialogue 2.english: We didn't just meet today, we met three years ago.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 王先生这个月才来上班的吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 王先生這個月才來上班的嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wáng xiānshēng zhège yuè cái lái shàngbān de ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Did Mr. Wang just start working this month?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是昨天晚上十点才打电话给他的?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你是不是昨天晚上十點才打電話給他的?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì zuótiān wǎnshàng shí diǎn cái dǎ diànhuà gěi tā de?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you just call him at ten o'clock last night?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你什么时候才可以跟我去看电影?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你什麼時候才可以跟我去看電影?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shénme shíhòu cái kěyǐ gēn wǒ qù kàn diànyǐng?
Dialogue 2.english: When will you be able to go to the movies with me?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 今天学的汉字,我还得练习练习。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 今天學的漢字,我還得練習練習。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: jīntiān xué de hànzì, wǒ hái děi liànxí liànxí.
Dialogue 2.english: I still need to practice the Chinese characters we learned today.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你有空的时候,应该去旅行。多认识认识一些台湾朋友。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你有空的時候,應該去旅行。多認識認識一些台灣朋友。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ yǒu kòng de shíhòu, yīnggāi qù lǚxíng. duō rènshì rènshì yīxiē táiwān péngyǒu.
Dialogue 2.english: When you have time, you should travel. Get to know some Taiwanese friends.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我想了解了解你是怎么学中文的,为什么说得这么流利。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我想了解了解你是怎麼學中文的,為什麼說得這麼流利。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng liǎojiě liǎojiě nǐ shì zěnme xué zhōngwén de, wèishéme shuō de zhème liúlì.
Dialogue 2.english: I want to know how you learned Chinese and why you speak so fluently.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 下星期要考试,你怎么不准备准备呢?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 下星期要考試,你怎麼不準備準備呢?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: xià xīngqí yào kǎoshì, nǐ zěnme bù zhǔnbèi zhǔnbèi ne?
Dialogue 2.english: There's a test next week, why aren't you preparing?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你不练习练习写字,听写怎么考得好?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你不練習練習寫字,聽寫怎麼考得好?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ bù liànxí liànxí xiězì, tīngxiě zěnme kǎo de hǎo?
Dialogue 2.english: If you don't practice writing, how will you do well in dictation?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我们不参观参观,怎么知道这个学校好不好?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我們不參觀參觀,怎麼知道這個學校好不好?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒmen bù cānguān cānguān, zěnme zhīdào zhège xuéxiào hǎo bù hǎo?
Dialogue 2.english: If we don't visit, how will we know if this school is good?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我是妳男朋友,妳是不是应该多关心关心我?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我是妳男朋友,妳是不是應該多關心關心我?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ shì nǎi nán péngyǒu, nǎi shì bù shì yīnggāi duō guānxīn guānxīn wǒ?
Dialogue 2.english: I am your boyfriend, shouldn't you care about me more?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 这个周末,你要不要在家休息休息?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 這個週末,你要不要在家休息休息?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhège zhōumò, nǐ yào bù yào zài jiā xiūxí xiūxí?
Dialogue 2.english: Do you want to stay at home and rest this weekend?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我有什么机会可以认识认识新朋友?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我有什麼機會可以認識認識新朋友?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ yǒu shé me jīhuì kěyǐ rènshì rènshì xīn péngyǒu?
Dialogue 2.english: What opportunities do I have to meet new friends?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 放假的时候,马安同除了常打篮球,还常踢足球。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 放假的時候,馬安同除了常打籃球,還常踢足球。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: fàngjià de shíhòu, mǎ āntóng chúle cháng dǎ lánqiú, hái cháng tī zúqiú.
Dialogue 1.english: During the holidays, Ma Antong not only often plays basketball but also often plays soccer.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 台湾好吃的小吃,除了牛肉面,还有小笼包。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 台灣好吃的小吃,除了牛肉麵,還有小籠包。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: táiwān hǎo chī de xiǎochī, chúle niúròu miàn, hái yǒu xiǎolóngbāo.
Dialogue 1.english: Delicious snacks in Taiwan, besides beef noodles, also include xiaolongbao.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 从学校到火车站,除了坐捷运,还可以坐公车。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 從學校到火車站,除了坐捷運,還可以坐公車。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: cóng xuéxiào dào huǒchē zhàn, chúle zuò jiéyùn, hái kěyǐ zuò gōngchē.
Dialogue 1.english: From school to the train station, besides taking the MRT, you can also take the bus.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 白如玉除了不喜欢喝茶,她还不喜欢喝咖啡。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 白如玉除了不喜歡喝茶,她還不喜歡喝咖啡。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: bái rúyù chúle bù xǐhuān hē chá, tā hái bù xǐhuān hē kāfēi.
Dialogue 1.english: Bai Ruyu, besides not liking to drink tea, also doesn't like to drink coffee.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同生病了,他除了没写作业,还没准备考试。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同生病了,他除了沒寫作業,還沒準備考試。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng shēngbìng le, tā chúle méi xiě zuòyè, hái méi zhǔnbèi kǎoshì.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong is sick, besides not doing his homework, he also didn't prepare for the exam.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 陈月美除了不喜欢太辣的菜,还不喜欢太甜的甜点。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 陳月美除了不喜歡太辣的菜,還不喜歡太甜的甜點。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: chén yuèměi chúle bù xǐhuān tài là de cài, hái bù xǐhuān tài tián de tiándiǎn.
Dialogue 1.english: Chen Yuemei, besides not liking very spicy food, also doesn't like very sweet desserts.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你们除了去故宫,还去了哪些地方?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你們除了去故宮,還去了哪些地方?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐmen chúle qù gùgōng, hái qù le nǎxiē dìfāng?
Dialogue 1.english: Besides going to the Palace Museum, where else did you go?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我们除了点牛肉面,还要点臭豆腐吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我們除了點牛肉麵,還要點臭豆腐嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒmen chúle diǎn niúròu miàn, hái yào diǎn chòu dòufu ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Besides ordering beef noodles, should we also order stinky tofu?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 除了芒果,他是不是还喜欢吃西瓜?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 除了芒果,他是不是還喜歡吃西瓜?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: chúle mángguǒ, tā shì bù shì hái xǐhuān chī xīguā?
Dialogue 1.english: Besides mangoes, does he also like to eat watermelons?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 按照医生说的,你睡觉以前要吃一包药。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 按照醫生說的,你睡覺以前要吃一包藥。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: ànzhào yīshēng shuō de, nǐ shuìjiào yǐqián yào chī yī bāo yào.
Dialogue 1.english: According to the doctor, you need to take a packet of medicine before going to bed.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我打算按照网络的介绍,自己去花莲玩玩。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我打算按照網路的介紹,自己去花蓮玩玩。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ dǎsuàn ànzhào wǎngluò de jièshào, zìjǐ qù huālián wán wán.
Dialogue 1.english: I plan to follow the online introduction and visit Hualien by myself.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 按照台湾的法律,刚来台湾的外国学生不可以工作。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 按照台灣的法律,剛來台灣的外國學生不可以工作。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: ànzhào táiwān de fǎlǜ, gāng lái táiwān de wàiguó xuéshēng bù kěyǐ gōngzuò.
Dialogue 1.english: According to Taiwanese law, foreign students who have just arrived in Taiwan cannot work.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同没按照老师的建议准备考试。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同沒按照老師的建議準備考試。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng méi ànzhào lǎoshī de jiànyì zhǔnbèi kǎoshì.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong didn't prepare for the exam according to the teacher's suggestion.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 田中诚一常常不按照老板说的做事。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 田中誠一常常不按照老闆說的做事。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī chángcháng bù ànzhào lǎobǎn shuō de zuò shì.
Dialogue 1.english: Tian Zhong Chengyi often doesn't do things according to what the boss says.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是按照网络上的说明做小笼包?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你是不是按照網路上的說明做小籠包?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì ànzhào wǎngluò shàng de shuōmíng zuò xiǎolóngbāo?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you make xiaolongbao according to the instructions online?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是按照老师给你的建议练习说话?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你是不是按照老師給你的建議練習說話?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì ànzhào lǎoshī gěi nǐ de jiànyì liànxí shuōhuà?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you practice speaking according to the teacher's advice?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 请你按照我们约的时间在捷运站跟我见面,好吗?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 請你按照我們約的時間在捷運站跟我見面,好嗎?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: qǐng nǐ ànzhào wǒmen yuē de shíjiān zài jiéyùn zhàn gēn wǒ jiànmiàn, hǎo ma?
Dialogue 1.english: Please meet me at the MRT station at the time we agreed upon, okay?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 老师跟学生说,明天要考试。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 老師跟學生說,明天要考試。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lǎoshī gēn xuéshēng shuō, míngtiān yào kǎoshì.
Dialogue 1.english: The teacher told the students that there will be an exam tomorrow.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他刚跟田中说明了他们国家的文化。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他剛跟田中說明了他們國家的文化。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā gāng gēn tiánzhōng shuōmíng le tāmen guójiā de wénhuà.
Dialogue 1.english: He just explained their country's culture to Tian Zhong.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 语言中心主任跟高美玲介绍工作环境。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 語言中心主任跟高美玲介紹工作環境。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yǔyán zhōngxīn zhǔrèn gēn gāo měilíng jièshào gōngzuò huánjìng.
Dialogue 1.english: The director of the language center introduced the work environment to Gao Meiling.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 田中诚一昨天跟马安同一起踢足球。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 田中誠一昨天跟馬安同一起踢足球。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī zuótiān gēn mǎ āntóng yīqǐ tī zúqiú.
Dialogue 1.english: Tian Zhong Chengyi played soccer with Ma Antong yesterday.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我是跟朋友一起来的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我是跟朋友一起來的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ shì gēn péngyǒu yīqǐ lái de.
Dialogue 1.english: I came with my friend.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 这个周末,我想跟朋友去台南玩。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 這個週末,我想跟朋友去台南玩。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhège zhōumò, wǒ xiǎng gēn péngyǒu qù táinán wán.
Dialogue 1.english: This weekend, I want to go to Tainan with my friends.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同想跟王老师学写书法。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同想跟王老師學寫書法。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng xiǎng gēn wáng lǎoshī xué xiě shūfǎ.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong wants to learn calligraphy from Teacher Wang.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他打算跟面包店老板学做面包。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他打算跟麵包店老闆學做麵包。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā dǎsuàn gēn miànbāo diàn lǎobǎn xué zuò miànbāo.
Dialogue 1.english: He plans to learn to make bread from the bakery owner.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我想跟朋友买他的那支旧手机。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我想跟朋友買他的那支舊手機。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng gēn péngyǒu mǎi tā de nà zhī jiù shǒujī.
Dialogue 1.english: I want to buy that old phone from my friend.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 请你不要跟别人说你和我的薪水。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 請你不要跟別人說你和我的薪水。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: qǐng nǐ bùyào gēn biérén shuō nǐ hé wǒ de xīnshuǐ.
Dialogue 1.english: Please don't tell others about your and my salary.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同没跟台湾朋友去看电脑展。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同沒跟台灣朋友去看電腦展。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng méi gēn táiwān péngyǒu qù kàn diànnǎo zhǎn.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong didn't go to the computer exhibition with his Taiwanese friends.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 田中诚一不是跟王老师学西班牙文,是跟马安同学的。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 田中誠一不是跟王老師學西班牙文,是跟馬安同學的。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī bù shì gēn wáng lǎoshī xué xībānyá wén, shì gēn mǎ āntóng xué de.
Dialogue 1.english: Tian Zhong Chengyi didn't learn Spanish from Teacher Wang, he learned it from Ma Antong.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是跟李教授学书法?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你是不是跟李教授學書法?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì gēn lǐ jiàoshòu xué shūfǎ?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you learn calligraphy from Professor Li?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你跟大家介绍办公室的环境了没有?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你跟大家介紹辦公室的環境了沒有?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ gēn dàjiā jièshào bàngōngshì de huánjìng le méiyǒu?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you introduce the office environment to everyone?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 下个星期,你跟不跟我去爬山?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 下個星期,你跟不跟我去爬山?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: xià gè xīngqí, nǐ gēn bù gēn wǒ qù páshān?
Dialogue 1.english: Next week, will you go hiking with me?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他给我们建议了台东很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他給我們建議了台東很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā gěi wǒmen jiànyì le táidōng hěnduō hǎowán de dìfāng.
Dialogue 1.english: He suggested many fun places in Taitung to us.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同昨天给房东打过电话。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同昨天給房東打過電話。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng zuótiān gěi fángdōng dǎ guò diànhuà.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong called the landlord yesterday.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 李明华给他介绍了很多台湾朋友。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 李明華給他介紹了很多台灣朋友。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá gěi tā jièshào le hěnduō táiwān péngyǒu.
Dialogue 1.english: Li Minghua introduced many Taiwanese friends to him.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我想明天给你过生日。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我想明天給你過生日。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng míngtiān gěi nǐ guò shēngrì.
Dialogue 1.english: I want to celebrate your birthday tomorrow.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 李明华给大家照相。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 李明華給大家照相。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá gěi dàjiā zhàoxiàng.
Dialogue 1.english: Li Minghua took photos for everyone.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同给同学们准备了西班牙咖啡。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同給同學們準備了西班牙咖啡。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng gěi tóngxuémen zhǔnbèi le xībānyá kāfēi.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong prepared Spanish coffee for the classmates.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 我没打电话给他。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 我沒打電話給他。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wǒ méi dǎ diànhuà gěi tā.
Dialogue 1.english: I didn't call him.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 因为她的男朋友不高兴,所以不给她打电话了。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 因為她的男朋友不高興,所以不給她打電話了。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yīnwèi tā de nán péngyǒu bù gāoxìng, suǒyǐ bù gěi tā dǎ diànhuà le.
Dialogue 1.english: Because her boyfriend is unhappy, he stopped calling her.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 妈妈感冒了,所以没给我们准备早餐。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 媽媽感冒了,所以沒給我們準備早餐。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: māma gǎnmào le, suǒyǐ méi gěi wǒmen zhǔnbèi zǎocān.
Dialogue 1.english: Mom caught a cold, so she didn't prepare breakfast for us.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是给他买了吃的东西?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你是不是給他買了吃的東西?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì gěi tā mǎi le chī de dōngxī?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you buy food for him?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 来台湾以后,你给妈妈打过电话没有?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 來台灣以後,你給媽媽打過電話沒有?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lái táiwān yǐhòu, nǐ gěi māma dǎ guò diànhuà méiyǒu?
Dialogue 1.english: After coming to Taiwan, have you called your mom?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 妳可不可以给我介绍一个打工的机会?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 妳可不可以給我介紹一個打工的機會?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ kě bù kěyǐ gěi wǒ jièshào yīgè dǎgōng de jīhuì?
Dialogue 1.english: Can you introduce a part-time job opportunity to me?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 陈主任对马安同说明了办公室的工作环境。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 陳主任對馬安同說明了辦公室的工作環境。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: chén zhǔrèn duì mǎ āntóng shuōmíng le bàngōngshì de gōngzuò huánjìng.
Dialogue 1.english: Director Chen explained the office work environment to Ma Antong.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 李明华对王开文说:对不起,我不知道你是美国人。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 李明華對王開文說:對不起,我不知道你是美國人。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá duì wáng kāiwén shuō: duìbùqǐ, wǒ bù zhīdào nǐ shì měiguó rén.
Dialogue 1.english: Li Minghua said to Wang Kaiwen: Sorry, I didn't know you were American.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他一看见我,就对我笑。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他一看見我,就對我笑。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā yī kànjiàn wǒ, jiù duì wǒ xiào.
Dialogue 1.english: As soon as he saw me, he smiled at me.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 他对台北的交通情况很了解。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 他對台北的交通情況很了解。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: tā duì táiběi de jiāotōng qíngkuàng hěn liǎojiě.
Dialogue 1.english: He is very familiar with Taipei's traffic situation.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 王主任对老师很客气。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 王主任對老師很客氣。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: wáng zhǔrèn duì lǎoshī hěn kèqì.
Dialogue 1.english: Director Wang is very polite to the teachers.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 张先生对这个事很关心。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 張先生對這個事很關心。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: zhāng xiānshēng duì zhège shì hěn guānxīn.
Dialogue 1.english: Mr. Zhang is very concerned about this matter.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你别对他说我找工作的事。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你別對他說我找工作的事。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ bié duì tā shuō wǒ zhǎo gōngzuò de shì.
Dialogue 1.english: Don't tell him about my job search.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 马安同没对陈月美说“对不起”。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 馬安同沒對陳月美說“對不起”。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: mǎ āntóng méi duì chén yuèměi shuō “duìbùqǐ”.
Dialogue 1.english: Ma Antong didn't say 'sorry' to Chen Yuemei.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 黄主任没对我说明钟点费的事。
Dialogue 1.traditional: 黃主任沒對我說明鐘點費的事。
Dialogue 1.pinyin: huáng zhǔrèn méi duì wǒ shuōmíng zhōngdiǎn fèi de shì.
Dialogue 1.english: Director Huang didn't explain the hourly fee to me.

Dialogue 1.simplified: 医生对你说了什么?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 醫生對你說了什麼?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: yīshēng duì nǐ shuō le shénme?
Dialogue 1.english: What did the doctor say to you?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你是不是对白如玉说了你要去看电脑展?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 妳是不是對白如玉說了妳要去看電腦展?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì duì bái rúyù shuō le nǐ yào qù kàn diànnǎo zhǎn?
Dialogue 1.english: Did you tell Bai Ruyu that you are going to the computer exhibition?

Dialogue 1.simplified: 你的房东对你好不好?
Dialogue 1.traditional: 你的房東對你好不好?
Dialogue 1.pinyin: nǐ de fángdōng duì nǐ hǎo bù hǎo?
Dialogue 1.english: Is your landlord nice to you?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 放假的时候,马安同除了常打篮球,还常踢足球。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 放假的時候,馬安同除了常打籃球,還常踢足球。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: fàngjià de shíhòu, mǎ āntóng chúle cháng dǎ lánqiú, hái cháng tī zúqiú.
Dialogue 2.english: During the holidays, Ma Antong not only often plays basketball but also often plays soccer.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 台湾好吃的小吃,除了牛肉面,还有小笼包。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 台灣好吃的小吃,除了牛肉麵,還有小籠包。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: táiwān hǎo chī de xiǎochī, chúle niúròu miàn, hái yǒu xiǎolóngbāo.
Dialogue 2.english: Delicious snacks in Taiwan, besides beef noodles, also include xiaolongbao.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 从学校到火车站,除了坐捷运,还可以坐公车。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 從學校到火車站,除了坐捷運,還可以坐公車。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: cóng xuéxiào dào huǒchē zhàn, chúle zuò jiéyùn, hái kěyǐ zuò gōngchē.
Dialogue 2.english: From school to the train station, besides taking the MRT, you can also take the bus.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 白如玉除了不喜欢喝茶,她还不喜欢喝咖啡。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 白如玉除了不喜歡喝茶,她還不喜歡喝咖啡。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: bái rúyù chúle bù xǐhuān hē chá, tā hái bù xǐhuān hē kāfēi.
Dialogue 2.english: Bai Ruyu, besides not liking to drink tea, also doesn't like to drink coffee.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同生病了,他除了没写作业,还没准备考试。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同生病了,他除了沒寫作業,還沒準備考試。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng shēngbìng le, tā chúle méi xiě zuòyè, hái méi zhǔnbèi kǎoshì.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong is sick, besides not doing his homework, he also didn't prepare for the exam.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 陈月美除了不喜欢太辣的菜,还不喜欢太甜的甜点。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 陳月美除了不喜歡太辣的菜,還不喜歡太甜的甜點。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: chén yuèměi chúle bù xǐhuān tài là de cài, hái bù xǐhuān tài tián de tiándiǎn.
Dialogue 2.english: Chen Yuemei, besides not liking very spicy food, also doesn't like very sweet desserts.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你们除了去故宫,还去了哪些地方?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你們除了去故宮,還去了哪些地方?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐmen chúle qù gùgōng, hái qù le nǎxiē dìfāng?
Dialogue 2.english: Besides going to the Palace Museum, where else did you go?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我们除了点牛肉面,还要点臭豆腐吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我們除了點牛肉麵,還要點臭豆腐嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒmen chúle diǎn niúròu miàn, hái yào diǎn chòu dòufu ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Besides ordering beef noodles, should we also order stinky tofu?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 除了芒果,他是不是还喜欢吃西瓜?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 除了芒果,他是不是還喜歡吃西瓜?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: chúle mángguǒ, tā shì bù shì hái xǐhuān chī xīguā?
Dialogue 2.english: Besides mangoes, does he also like to eat watermelons?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 按照医生说的,你睡觉以前要吃一包药。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 按照醫生說的,你睡覺以前要吃一包藥。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: ànzhào yīshēng shuō de, nǐ shuìjiào yǐqián yào chī yī bāo yào.
Dialogue 2.english: According to the doctor, you need to take a packet of medicine before going to bed.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我打算按照网络的介绍,自己去花莲玩玩。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我打算按照網路的介紹,自己去花蓮玩玩。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ dǎsuàn ànzhào wǎngluò de jièshào, zìjǐ qù huālián wán wán.
Dialogue 2.english: I plan to follow the online introduction and visit Hualien by myself.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 按照台湾的法律,刚来台湾的外国学生不可以工作。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 按照台灣的法律,剛來台灣的外國學生不可以工作。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: ànzhào táiwān de fǎlǜ, gāng lái táiwān de wàiguó xuéshēng bù kěyǐ gōngzuò.
Dialogue 2.english: According to Taiwanese law, foreign students who have just arrived in Taiwan cannot work.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同没按照老师的建议准备考试。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同沒按照老師的建議準備考試。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng méi ànzhào lǎoshī de jiànyì zhǔnbèi kǎoshì.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong didn't prepare for the exam according to the teacher's suggestion.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 田中诚一常常不按照老板说的做事。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 田中誠一常常不按照老闆說的做事。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī chángcháng bù ànzhào lǎobǎn shuō de zuò shì.
Dialogue 2.english: Tian Zhong Chengyi often doesn't do things according to what the boss says.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是按照网络上的说明做小笼包?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你是不是按照網路上的說明做小籠包?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì ànzhào wǎngluò shàng de shuōmíng zuò xiǎolóngbāo?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you make xiaolongbao according to the instructions online?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是按照老师给你的建议练习说话?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你是不是按照老師給你的建議練習說話?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì ànzhào lǎoshī gěi nǐ de jiànyì liànxí shuōhuà?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you practice speaking according to the teacher's advice?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 请你按照我们约的时间在捷运站跟我见面,好吗?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 請你按照我們約的時間在捷運站跟我見面,好嗎?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: qǐng nǐ ànzhào wǒmen yuē de shíjiān zài jiéyùn zhàn gēn wǒ jiànmiàn, hǎo ma?
Dialogue 2.english: Please meet me at the MRT station at the time we agreed upon, okay?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 老师跟学生说,明天要考试。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 老師跟學生說,明天要考試。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: lǎoshī gēn xuéshēng shuō, míngtiān yào kǎoshì.
Dialogue 2.english: The teacher told the students that there will be an exam tomorrow.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他刚跟田中说明了他们国家的文化。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他剛跟田中說明了他們國家的文化。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā gāng gēn tiánzhōng shuōmíng le tāmen guójiā de wénhuà.
Dialogue 2.english: He just explained their country's culture to Tian Zhong.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 语言中心主任跟高美玲介绍工作环境。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 語言中心主任跟高美玲介紹工作環境。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yǔyán zhōngxīn zhǔrèn gēn gāo měilíng jièshào gōngzuò huánjìng.
Dialogue 2.english: The director of the language center introduced the work environment to Gao Meiling.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 田中诚一昨天跟马安同一起踢足球。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 田中誠一昨天跟馬安同一起踢足球。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī zuótiān gēn mǎ āntóng yīqǐ tī zúqiú.
Dialogue 2.english: Tian Zhong Chengyi played soccer with Ma Antong yesterday.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我是跟朋友一起来的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我是跟朋友一起來的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ shì gēn péngyǒu yīqǐ lái de.
Dialogue 2.english: I came with my friend.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 这个周末,我想跟朋友去台南玩。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 這個週末,我想跟朋友去台南玩。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhège zhōumò, wǒ xiǎng gēn péngyǒu qù táinán wán.
Dialogue 2.english: This weekend, I want to go to Tainan with my friends.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同想跟王老师学写书法。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同想跟王老師學寫書法。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng xiǎng gēn wáng lǎoshī xué xiě shūfǎ.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong wants to learn calligraphy from Teacher Wang.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他打算跟面包店老板学做面包。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他打算跟麵包店老闆學做麵包。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā dǎsuàn gēn miànbāo diàn lǎobǎn xué zuò miànbāo.
Dialogue 2.english: He plans to learn to make bread from the bakery owner.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我想跟朋友买他的那支旧手机。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我想跟朋友買他的那支舊手機。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng gēn péngyǒu mǎi tā de nà zhī jiù shǒujī.
Dialogue 2.english: I want to buy that old phone from my friend.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 请你不要跟别人说你和我的薪水。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 請你不要跟別人說你和我的薪水。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: qǐng nǐ bùyào gēn biérén shuō nǐ hé wǒ de xīnshuǐ.
Dialogue 2.english: Please don't tell others about your and my salary.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同没跟台湾朋友去看电脑展。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同沒跟台灣朋友去看電腦展。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng méi gēn táiwān péngyǒu qù kàn diànnǎo zhǎn.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong didn't go to the computer exhibition with his Taiwanese friends.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 田中诚一不是跟王老师学西班牙文,是跟马安同学的。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 田中誠一不是跟王老師學西班牙文,是跟馬安同學的。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tiánzhōng chéng yī bù shì gēn wáng lǎoshī xué xībānyá wén, shì gēn mǎ āntóng xué de.
Dialogue 2.english: Tian Zhong Chengyi didn't learn Spanish from Teacher Wang, he learned it from Ma Antong.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是跟李教授学书法?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你是不是跟李教授學書法?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì gēn lǐ jiàoshòu xué shūfǎ?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you learn calligraphy from Professor Li?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你跟大家介绍办公室的环境了没有?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你跟大家介紹辦公室的環境了沒有?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ gēn dàjiā jièshào bàngōngshì de huánjìng le méiyǒu?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you introduce the office environment to everyone?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 下个星期,你跟不跟我去爬山?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 下個星期,你跟不跟我去爬山?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: xià gè xīngqí, nǐ gēn bù gēn wǒ qù páshān?
Dialogue 2.english: Next week, will you go hiking with me?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他给我们建议了台东很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他給我們建議了台東很多好玩的地方。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā gěi wǒmen jiànyì le táidōng hěnduō hǎowán de dìfāng.
Dialogue 2.english: He suggested many fun places in Taitung to us.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同昨天给房东打过电话。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同昨天給房東打過電話。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng zuótiān gěi fángdōng dǎ guò diànhuà.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong called the landlord yesterday.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 李明华给他介绍了很多台湾朋友。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 李明華給他介紹了很多台灣朋友。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá gěi tā jièshào le hěnduō táiwān péngyǒu.
Dialogue 2.english: Li Minghua introduced many Taiwanese friends to him.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我想明天给你过生日。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我想明天給你過生日。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng míngtiān gěi nǐ guò shēngrì.
Dialogue 2.english: I want to celebrate your birthday tomorrow.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 李明华给大家照相。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 李明華給大家照相。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá gěi dàjiā zhàoxiàng.
Dialogue 2.english: Li Minghua took photos for everyone.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同给同学们准备了西班牙咖啡。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同給同學們準備了西班牙咖啡。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng gěi tóngxuémen zhǔnbèi le xībānyá kāfēi.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong prepared Spanish coffee for the classmates.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 我没打电话给他。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 我沒打電話給他。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wǒ méi dǎ diànhuà gěi tā.
Dialogue 2.english: I didn't call him.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 因为她的男朋友不高兴,所以不给她打电话了。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 因為她的男朋友不高興,所以不給她打電話了。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yīnwèi tā de nán péngyǒu bù gāoxìng, suǒyǐ bù gěi tā dǎ diànhuà le.
Dialogue 2.english: Because her boyfriend is unhappy, he stopped calling her.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 妈妈感冒了,所以没给我们准备早餐。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 媽媽感冒了,所以沒給我們準備早餐。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: māma gǎnmào le, suǒyǐ méi gěi wǒmen zhǔnbèi zǎocān.
Dialogue 2.english: Mom caught a cold, so she didn't prepare breakfast for us.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是给他买了吃的东西?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你是不是給他買了吃的東西?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì gěi tā mǎi le chī de dōngxī?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you buy food for him?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 来台湾以后,你给妈妈打过电话没有?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 來台灣以後,你給媽媽打過電話沒有?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: lái táiwān yǐhòu, nǐ gěi māma dǎ guò diànhuà méiyǒu?
Dialogue 2.english: After coming to Taiwan, have you called your mom?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 妳可不可以给我介绍一个打工的机会?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 妳可不可以給我介紹一個打工的機會?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ kě bù kěyǐ gěi wǒ jièshào yīgè dǎgōng de jīhuì?
Dialogue 2.english: Can you introduce a part-time job opportunity to me?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 陈主任对马安同说明了办公室的工作环境。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 陳主任對馬安同說明了辦公室的工作環境。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: chén zhǔrèn duì mǎ āntóng shuōmíng le bàngōngshì de gōngzuò huánjìng.
Dialogue 2.english: Director Chen explained the office work environment to Ma Antong.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 李明华对王开文说:对不起,我不知道你是美国人。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 李明華對王開文說:對不起,我不知道你是美國人。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: lǐ mínghuá duì wáng kāiwén shuō: duìbùqǐ, wǒ bù zhīdào nǐ shì měiguó rén.
Dialogue 2.english: Li Minghua said to Wang Kaiwen: Sorry, I didn't know you were American.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他一看见我,就对我笑。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他一看見我,就對我笑。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā yī kànjiàn wǒ, jiù duì wǒ xiào.
Dialogue 2.english: As soon as he saw me, he smiled at me.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 他对台北的交通情况很了解。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 他對台北的交通情況很了解。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: tā duì táiběi de jiāotōng qíngkuàng hěn liǎojiě.
Dialogue 2.english: He is very familiar with Taipei's traffic situation.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 王主任对老师很客气。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 王主任對老師很客氣。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: wáng zhǔrèn duì lǎoshī hěn kèqì.
Dialogue 2.english: Director Wang is very polite to the teachers.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 张先生对这个事很关心。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 張先生對這個事很關心。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: zhāng xiānshēng duì zhège shì hěn guānxīn.
Dialogue 2.english: Mr. Zhang is very concerned about this matter.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你别对他说我找工作的事。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你別對他說我找工作的事。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ bié duì tā shuō wǒ zhǎo gōngzuò de shì.
Dialogue 2.english: Don't tell him about my job search.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 马安同没对陈月美说“对不起”。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 馬安同沒對陳月美說“對不起”。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: mǎ āntóng méi duì chén yuèměi shuō “duìbùqǐ”.
Dialogue 2.english: Ma Antong didn't say 'sorry' to Chen Yuemei.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 黄主任没对我说明钟点费的事。
Dialogue 2.traditional: 黃主任沒對我說明鐘點費的事。
Dialogue 2.pinyin: huáng zhǔrèn méi duì wǒ shuōmíng zhōngdiǎn fèi de shì.
Dialogue 2.english: Director Huang didn't explain the hourly fee to me.

Dialogue 2.simplified: 医生对你说了什么?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 醫生對你說了什麼?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: yīshēng duì nǐ shuō le shénme?
Dialogue 2.english: What did the doctor say to you?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你是不是对白如玉说了你要去看电脑展?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 妳是不是對白如玉說了妳要去看電腦展?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ shì bù shì duì bái rúyù shuō le nǐ yào qù kàn diànnǎo zhǎn?
Dialogue 2.english: Did you tell Bai Ruyu that you are going to the computer exhibition?

Dialogue 2.simplified: 你的房东对你好不好?
Dialogue 2.traditional: 你的房東對你好不好?
Dialogue 2.pinyin: nǐ de fángdōng duì nǐ hǎo bù hǎo?
Dialogue 2.english: Is your landlord nice to you?
